title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 263.2 - City of Yonkers earnings tax returns by or for minors
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 263.2 - City of Yonkers earnings tax returns by or for minors

State Regulations

For City of Yonkers earnings tax purposes, a minor is a
taxpayer and is subject to the same requirements for making City of Yonkers
returns of earnings as are other individuals, even though the minor's parent
has, under law, the legal right to the minor's earnings from personal services
and actually receives such earnings. If a minor is unable to make his City of

Yonkers earnings tax return, such minor's parent, guardian or other person
charged with the care of such minor's person or property must make and file
such City of Yonkers earnings tax return for such minor (see section
263.8
of this Part). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
263.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
